option.value: Enum_Classe.Assassin|True|Innate: At the start of combat, Assassins leap to the farthest enemy. Assassins gain bonus Critical Strike Damage and Chance.|3|+75% Critical Strike Damage & 5% Critical Strike Chance|6|+150% Critical Strike Damage & 20% Critical Strike Chance|9|+225% Critical Strike Damage & 30% Critical Strike Chance|| Enum_Classe.Blademaster|True|Blademasters have a 35% chance to strike additional times each attack.|3|One Extra Attack|6|Two Extra Attack|9|Four Extra Attack|| Enum_Classe.Brawler|True|Brawlers receive bonus maximum health.|2|250 Bonus Health|4|500 Bonus Health|6|900 Bonus Health|| Enum_Classe.Elementalist|True|Elementalists gain double mana from attacks.|3|At the start of combat, summon a Golem with 2200 HP|-1| |-2| || Enum_Classe.Guardian|True| |2|At the start of combat, Guardians grant +45 Armor to adjacent allies (this bonus can stack any number of times).|-1| |-2| || Enum_Classe.Gunslinger|True|Gunslinger Basic Attacks have a 50% chance to fire additional bullets at other enemies within range. Deal damage like Basic Attacks and apply on-hit effects.|2|Attack 1 extra enemy|4|Attack 2 extra enemies|6|Attack 4 extra enemies|| Enum_Classe.Knight|True|All allies block a flat amount of damage from all sources.|2|15 Damage Ignored|4|35 Damage Ignored|6|60 Damage Ignored|| Enum_Classe.Ranger|True|Every 3 seconds, Rangers have a chance to double their Attack Speed for 3 seconds.|2|25% Chance to Double Attack Speed|4|70% Chance to Double Attack Speed|-2| || Enum_Classe.Shapeshifter|True|Shapeshifters gain bonus Maximum Health when they transform.|3|60% Bonus Maximum Health|6|100% Bonus Maximum Health|-2| || Enum_Classe.Sorcerer|True|Sorcerers gain double mana from attacking and allies have increased ability power.|3|+40% ability power|6|+100% ability power|9|+175% ability power|| Enum_Classe.Demon|False|Demon basic attacks have a 40% chance to burn 20 mana from their target and return some mana to the attacker.|2|15 mana returned|4|30 mana returned|6|45 mana returned|| Enum_Classe.Dragon|False| |2|Dragons gain 75% resistance to Magic Damage|-1| |-2| || Enum_Classe.Exile|False| |1|If an Exile has no adjacent allies at the start of combat, they gain a shield equal to 100% of their maximum health|-1| |-2| || Enum_Classe.Glacial|False|Basic Attacks from Glacials have a chance to stun their target for 1.5 seconds.|2|20% Chance to Stun|4|33% Chance to Stun|6|50% Chance to Stun|| Enum_Classe.Imperial|False|Imperials deal Double Damage.|2|One Random Imperial|4|All Imperials|-2| || Enum_Classe.Noble|False|At the start of combat, select allies gain +50 Armor, +50 Magic Resistance, and heal 30 on-hit.|3|One Random Ally|6|All Allies|-2| || Enum_Classe.Ninja|False|Ninjas gain bonus Attack Damage and Spell Power. This trait is only active when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Ninjas.|1|Ninja gains +50 Attack Damage & +50% Spell Power|4|All Ninjas gain +80 Attack Damage & +80% Spell Power|-2| || Enum_Classe.Pirate|False| |3|Earn up to 4 additional gold after combat against another player|-1| |-2| || Enum_Classe.Phantom|False| |2|Curse a random enemy at the start of combat, setting their HP to 100|-1| |-2| || Enum_Classe.Robot|False| |1|Robots start combat at full mana|-1| |-2| || Enum_Classe.Void|False|Basic Attacks and Spells from select Void champions deal true damage.|2|1 Random Void champion|4|All Void champions|-2| || Enum_Classe.Wild|False|Select allies' Basic Attacks are empowered to grant +10% Bonus Attack Speed (stacks up to 5 times).|2|Wild Allies Only|4|All Allies. Basic attacks cannot be dodged.|-2| || Enum_Classe.Yordle|False|Yordles gain a chance to dodge enemy Basic Attacks.|3|35% Chance to Miss|6|60% Chance to Miss|9|90% Chance to Dodge|| Enum_Classe.Hextech|False|Throw a bomb at an enemy unit with an item, and disables all items in a hex radius for 7 seconds.|2|1 hex radius|4|2 hex radius|-2|

Enemies inside the zone have their Attack Speed reduced by 35%.|| Quicksilver|Enum_Item.Quicksilver|Enum_Item.NegatronCloak|Enum_Item.SparringGloves|The wearer gains a shield that prevents the next crowd control effect from applying. When it breaks, stun the champion who broke the shield.|| Thief's Gloves|Enum_Item.ThiefsGloves|Enum_Item.SparringGloves|Enum_Item.SparringGloves|At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer equips 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level.|| Mittens|Enum_Item.Mittens|Enum_Item.Spatula|Enum_Item.SparringGloves|This champ also counts as a Yordle.|| Deathblade|Enum_Item.Deathblade|Enum_Item.BFSword|Enum_Item.BFSword|Whenever the wearer kills or participates in killing an enemy, gain +15 Attack Damage for the remainder of combat. This effect can stack any number of times.
